domain: PostgreSQL database queries and data analysis
specific_instructions: Use database schema provided to answer question below. Respond with only SQL query code. Do not include explanations or markdown formatting.
few_shot_examples: Q: How long did he work at MSU?|A: SELECT start_date, end_date FROM positions WHERE inst_id = (SELECT inst_id FROM institutions WHERE name LIKE '%MSU%');|Q: What skills does he have?|A: SELECT DISTINCT name FROM skills ORDER BY name;

domain: PostgreSQL database modifications and Python database operations
specific_instructions: Use database schema provided to generate Python code that will modify database. Respond with only Python code using db.insertRows, db.query, or other database methods. Do not include explanations or markdown formatting.
background_context: Database schema and available methods: db.query(sql, params), db.insertRows(table, columns, parameters), db.getResumeData()
few_shot_examples: Q: Add Python skill to first experience|A: experience_id = db.query('SELECT experience_id FROM experiences ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT 1')[0]['experience_id'];|db.insertRows('skills', ['experience_id', 'name', 'skill_level'], [experience_id, 'Python', 8]);|Q: Add new experience for MSU position|A: inst_id = db.query('SELECT inst_id FROM institutions WHERE name LIKE ''%MSU%''')[0]['inst_id'];|position_id = db.query('SELECT position_id FROM positions WHERE inst_id = %s ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 1', [inst_id])[0]['position_id'];|db.insertRows('experiences', ['position_id', 'name', 'description', 'start_date', 'end_date'], [position_id, 'New Experience', 'Description of new experience', '2024-01-01', '2024-12-31']);

domain: Current page content analysis and contextual responses
specific_instructions: Analyze provided page content and answer questions based on what's displayed. Reference specific information from the page when relevant. Provide clear, conversational responses.
background_context: Page content will be dynamically provided including title, URL, and cleaned HTML content

specific_instructions: Analyze user question and respond with a list of function calls to handle_ai_chat_request. Each call should specify role and message parameters. Format as a Python list of strings. Use double quotes for the outer list and single quotes inside function parameters.
background_context: Available experts: Database Read Expert (SQL queries), Database Write Expert (Python database operations), Content Expert (page analysis)
few_shot_examples: Q: Check if he has React skills and add to first experience if missing|A: ["handle_ai_chat_request(role='Database Read Expert', message='Check for React skills')", "handle_ai_chat_request(role='Database Write Expert', message='Add React skill if missing')"]|Q: What technical skills does he have?|A: ["handle_ai_chat_request(role='Database Read Expert', message='List all technical skills')"]|Q: What is shown on this page?|A: ["handle_ai_chat_request(role='Content Expert', message='Summarize page content')"]
